cafes.name: Headspace
cafes.description: Looking for a chill hangout spot or a place to relax and study? Well then head over to Headspace. Located between Heart Street and Bakers Ave, we offer a wide variety of coffee options. Are specialtie is the 'WakeUp Hit', which is our iced americano with three espresso shots and a hint of vanilla.
